Thread Method

Thread the messages in the folder that match the search query using the specified threading algorithm.

Syntax

public abstract IList<MessageThread> Thread (ThreadingAlgorithm algorithm, MailKit.Search.SearchQuery query, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken)

Parameters

algorithm
The threading algorithm to use.
query
The search query.
cancellationToken
The cancellation token.

Returns

An array of message threads.

Exceptions

Type Reason
ArgumentOutOfRangeException algorithm is not supported.
ArgumentNullException query is null.
NotSupportedException

One or more search terms in the query are not supported by the mail store.

-or-

The server does not support the THREAD extension.
ObjectDisposedException The MailKit.IMailStore has been disposed.
InvalidOperationException

The MailKit.IMailStore is not connected.

-or-

The MailKit.IMailStore is not authenticated.

-or-

The folder is not currently open.
OperationCanceledException The operation was canceled via the cancellation token.
System.IO.IOException An I/O error occurred.
MailKit.ProtocolException The server's response contained unexpected tokens.
MailKit.CommandException The command failed.

Remarks

The MessageThread.UniqueId can be used with IMailFolder.GetMessage(UniqueId, System.Threading.CancellationToken).

Requirements

Namespace: MailKit
Assembly: MailKit (in MailKit.dll)
Assembly Versions: 1.0.0.0

Thread Method

Thread the messages in the folder that match the search query using the specified threading algorithm.

Syntax

public abstract IList<MessageThread> Thread (IList<UniqueId> uids, ThreadingAlgorithm algorithm, MailKit.Search.SearchQuery query, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken)

Parameters

uids
The subset of UIDs
algorithm
The threading algorithm to use.
query
The search query.
cancellationToken
The cancellation token.

Returns

An array of message threads.

Exceptions

Type Reason
ArgumentOutOfRangeException algorithm is not supported.
ArgumentNullException

uids is null.

-or-

query is null.
ArgumentException

uids is empty.

-or-

One or more of the uids is invalid.
NotSupportedException

One or more search terms in the query are not supported by the mail store.

-or-

The server does not support the THREAD extension.
ObjectDisposedException The MailKit.IMailStore has been disposed.
InvalidOperationException

The MailKit.IMailStore is not connected.

-or-

The MailKit.IMailStore is not authenticated.

-or-

The folder is not currently open.
OperationCanceledException The operation was canceled via the cancellation token.
System.IO.IOException An I/O error occurred.
MailKit.ProtocolException The server's response contained unexpected tokens.
MailKit.CommandException The command failed.

Remarks

The MessageThread.UniqueId can be used with IMailFolder.GetMessage(UniqueId, System.Threading.CancellationToken).

Requirements

Namespace: MailKit
Assembly: MailKit (in MailKit.dll)
Assembly Versions: 1.0.0.0

ThreadAsync Method

Asynchronously thread the messages in the folder that match the search query using the specified threading algorithm.

Syntax

public virtual System.Threading.Tasks.Task<IList<MessageThread>> ThreadAsync (ThreadingAlgorithm algorithm, MailKit.Search.SearchQuery query, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken)

Parameters

algorithm
The threading algorithm to use.
query
The search query.
cancellationToken
The cancellation token.

Returns

An array of message threads.

Exceptions

Type Reason
ArgumentOutOfRangeException algorithm is not supported.
ArgumentNullException query is null.
NotSupportedException

One or more search terms in the query are not supported by the mail store.

-or-

The server does not support the THREAD extension.
ObjectDisposedException The MailKit.IMailStore has been disposed.
InvalidOperationException

The MailKit.IMailStore is not connected.

-or-

The MailKit.IMailStore is not authenticated.

-or-

The folder is not currently open.
OperationCanceledException The operation was canceled via the cancellation token.
System.IO.IOException An I/O error occurred.
MailKit.ProtocolException The server's response contained unexpected tokens.
MailKit.CommandException The command failed.

Remarks

The MessageThread.UniqueId can be used with IMailFolder.GetMessage(UniqueId, System.Threading.CancellationToken).

Requirements

Namespace: MailKit
Assembly: MailKit (in MailKit.dll)
Assembly Versions: 1.0.0.0

ThreadAsync Method

Asynchronously thread the messages in the folder that match the search query using the specified threading algorithm.

Syntax

public virtual System.Threading.Tasks.Task<IList<MessageThread>> ThreadAsync (IList<UniqueId> uids, ThreadingAlgorithm algorithm, MailKit.Search.SearchQuery query, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken)

Parameters

uids
The subset of UIDs
algorithm
The threading algorithm to use.
query
The search query.
cancellationToken
The cancellation token.

Returns

An array of message threads.

Exceptions

Type Reason
ArgumentOutOfRangeException algorithm is not supported.
ArgumentNullException

uids is null.

-or-

query is null.
ArgumentException

uids is empty.

-or-

One or more of the uids is invalid.
NotSupportedException

One or more search terms in the query are not supported by the mail store.

-or-

The server does not support the THREAD extension.
ObjectDisposedException The MailKit.IMailStore has been disposed.
InvalidOperationException

The MailKit.IMailStore is not connected.

-or-

The MailKit.IMailStore is not authenticated.

-or-

The folder is not currently open.
OperationCanceledException The operation was canceled via the cancellation token.
System.IO.IOException An I/O error occurred.
MailKit.ProtocolException The server's response contained unexpected tokens.
MailKit.CommandException The command failed.

Remarks

The MessageThread.UniqueId can be used with IMailFolder.GetMessage(UniqueId, System.Threading.CancellationToken).

Requirements

Namespace: MailKit
Assembly: MailKit (in MailKit.dll)
Assembly Versions: 1.0.0.0

Assembly Versions: 1.0.0.0

UidNext Property

Get the UID that the folder will assign to the next message that is added.

Syntax

public Nullable<UniqueId> UidNext { get; protected set; }

Value

The next UID.

Remarks

This value will only be set after the folder has been opened.

Requirements

Namespace: MailKit
Assembly: MailKit (in MailKit.dll)
Assembly Versions: 1.0.0.0

UidValidity Property

Get the UID validity.

Syntax

public uint UidValidity { get; protected set; }

Value

The UID validity.

Remarks

UIDs are only valid so long as the UID validity value remains unchanged. If and when the folder's MailFolder.UidValidity is changed, a client MUST discard its cache of UIDs along with any summary information that it may have and re-query the folder.

This value will only be set after the folder has been opened.

Requirements

Namespace: MailKit
Assembly: MailKit (in MailKit.dll)
Assembly Versions: 1.0.0.0

UidValidityChanged Event

Occurs when the UID validity changes.

Syntax

public event EventHandler<EventArgs> UidValidityChanged

Remarks

The MailFolder.UidValidityChanged event is emitted whenever the MailFolder.UidValidity value changes.

Requirements

Namespace: MailKit
Assembly: MailKit (in MailKit.dll)
Assembly Versions: 1.0.0.0

Unread Property

Get the number of unread messages in the folder.

Syntax

public int Unread { get; protected set; }

Value

The number of unread messages.

Remarks

Gets the number of unread messages in the folder.

Note: This value will only be set after calling MailFolder.Status(StatusItems, System.Threading.CancellationToken) with StatusItems.Unread.

Requirements

Namespace: MailKit
Assembly: MailKit (in MailKit.dll)
Assembly Versions: 1.0.0.0

Unsubscribe Method

Unsubscribe from the folder.

Syntax

public abstract void Unsubscribe (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken)

Parameters

cancellationToken
The cancellation token.

Exceptions

Type Reason
ObjectDisposedException The MailKit.IMailStore has been disposed.
InvalidOperationException The MailKit.IMailStore is either not connected or not authenticated.
OperationCanceledException The operation was canceled via the cancellation token.
System.IO.IOException An I/O error occurred.
MailKit.ProtocolException The server's response contained unexpected tokens.
MailKit.CommandException The command failed.

Remarks

Unsubscribes from the folder.

Requirements

Namespace: MailKit
Assembly: MailKit (in MailKit.dll)
Assembly Versions: 1.0.0.0

Parameters

cancellationToken
The cancellation token.

Returns

An asynchronous task context.

Exceptions

Type Reason

InvalidOperationException The MailKit.IMailStore is either not connected or not authenticated.
OperationCanceledException The operation was canceled via the cancellation token.
System.IO.IOException An I/O error occurred.
MailKit.ProtocolException The server's response contained unexpected tokens.
MailKit.CommandException The command failed.

Remarks

Unsubscribed Event

Occurs when the folder is unsubscribed.

Syntax

Remarks

The MailFolder.Unsubscribed event is emitted when the folder is unsubscribed.
